mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb ( username, email, user_birth, phone, display_nickname, user_profile_img_url, created_dt ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{userBirth}, #{phone}, #{displayUsername}, #{userProfileImgUrl}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM oauth2_user_tb WHERE provider = #{provider} AND provider_id = #{providerId}

SELECT user_id as userId, username, email, user_birth as userBirth, phone, display_nickname as displayUsername, user_profile_img_url as userProfileImgUrl, last_login_dt as lastLoginDt, created_dt as createdDt, updated_dt as updatedDt FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId}
